create_user_table:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
 name CHAR(36) NOT NULL,
 password CHAR(255) NOT NULL
,
 key CHAR(255) NOT NULL);
create_pm_table:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pm(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
 userId INTEGER NOT NULL,
 websiteAddress CHAR(100),
 username CHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 password CHAR(20) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY(userId) REFERENCES users(id));
insert_user: INSERT INTO users(name, password, key) VALUES(?, ?, ?);
insert_pm: INSERT INTO pm(userId, websiteAddress, username, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
find_user: SELECT id, name, password, key FROM users WHERE name = ?;
find_user_pm: SELECT id, userId, websiteAddress, username FROM pm WHERE websiteAddress = ? AND username = ?;
